entry.title: Argan Oil Hair Serum
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type:
Price: 0.00

Kounuz Alard Argan Oil Hair Serum gives luscious, lightweight hair oil serum for dry hair, lifeless hair,

Apply and experience transformation from the 1st operation in Hair.

  • Promote Healthy Argan Oil Hair Serum Growth, The Smart Way - Thicker, stronger, more healthy-looking hair is not just a matter of genetics, its a matter of nutrition too. With this wonderful biotin hair strengthening serum, you can finally help give yourself the dense and lustrous hair you always wanted.
  • See What The Power Of Biotin Can Do For You - The secret of the serum strength lies in its proprietary formula. By combining biotin, D Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Pisum Sativum Pea Sprout Extract, and other active ingredients and nutrients, it provides a follicle boosting effect that can assist in the retention and growth of natural, healthy-looking hair.
  • Premium Quality Argan Oil Hair SerumIngredients - When it comes to our skin and hair care products, we firmly believe there is no room for cutting corners. That is why we make a point of using nothing but the finest, carefully selected ingredients.
  • Easy To Incorporate Into Your Daily Argan Oil Hair Serum Care Routine - For the best results, apply to slightly damp hair after washing or rinsing. Work a quarter-sized amount of product into palms and massage into your scalp, working from root to tip of hair using your fingertips. Sit back and relax as your Argan Oil Hair Serumfully absorbs the serum and all the nutrients that come along with it.

entry.title: Unroasted Argan oil 250 ml
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type:
Price: 0.00

Unroasted Argan oil Kounouz AlardÂ  is traditionally used as a treatment for skin diseases and as cosmetic oil for skin and hair:
"In cosmetics, Unroasted Argan oil is advocated as moisturizing oil, against juvenile acne and flaking of the skin as well as for nourishing the hair. This oil has also medicinal uses against rheumatism and the healing of burns ... Externally, Argan oil is used ... for hair as brilliantine, to fortify and ... in the treatment of wrinkled or scaly dry skin".
Unroasted Argan oil has become increasingly popular for cosmetic use. The number of personal-care products on the US market with Argan oil as an ingredient increased from just two in 2007 to over one hundred by 2011. It is sometimes mixed with pomegranate seed oil due to its anti oxidizing benefits; with vendors promoting this blend as an all-in-one serum both for skin and hair. Argan oil is also sold without additives as a natural skincare and hair care product.
The increasing popularity of Unroasted Argan oil KounouzÂ AlardÂ has prompted the MoroccanÂ  government to plan for increased production: its aim is to increase annual production from approximately 2,500 to 4,000 tonnes by 2020.
Composition :Â 100% pure Argan oil .

entry.title: Organic Argan Oil Cream
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: KA
Price: 0.00

The Organic Argan Oil Cream with extract of argan oil is the perfect way to nourish all skin types.

Argan oil has been used for centuries in skincare to treat the face and body, and even the hair. Organic Argan Oil Cream contains essential fatty acids that help to tackle signs of premature aging such as fine lines and wrinkles. It improves elasticity so that skin looks younger.

This comforting Organic Argan Oil Cream also contains shea butter and aloe vera. Shea butter nourishes and protects, forming a barrier between skin and free radicals such as pollution, while delivering a hit of hydration. Aloe vera repairs skin irritations and imperfections such as spots or rashes, thanks to Organic Argan Oil Cream because its calming anti-inflammatory properties.

ThisÂ Organic Argan Oil Cream has a soft texture that is absorbed easily into the skin. It is certified organic , and it contains no parabens, allergens or mineral oils, making Organic Argan Oil Cream ideal for sensitive skins.
